channel.title: Getting Started on HoneyTrap
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on HoneyTrap

item.title: Get Started
item.description: If this is your first time using HoneyTrap, we recommend the quick start. Next, you can check thedescription of the configuration used in the quick start, where every configurable field is explained. Afterwards, you can either have a look at the entire panel of features and possibilities offered by HoneyTrap at the Configuration section or go directly to setup to decide which mode you want to implement.

item.title: HoneyTrap Configuration
item.description: In the following sections, you can find all the configurations available for your HoneyTrap.
